segment.source: How to Remove an Application License Group
segment.target: How to Remove an Application License Group

segment.source: How to Remove an Application License Group
segment.target: How to Remove an Application License Group

segment.source: How to Remove an Application License Group
segment.target: How to Remove an Application License Group

segment.source: In the Application Virtualization Server Management Console, you can use the following procedure to remove an application license group.
segment.target: In the Application Virtualization Server Management Console, you can use the following procedure to remove an application license group.

segment.source: After you do this, you will be unable to apply license controls or use reports to track the licenses.
segment.target: After you do this, you will be unable to apply license controls or use reports to track the licenses.

segment.source: Important
segment.target: Important

segment.source: Before you can remove a license group, you must remove any licenses associated with the group.
segment.target: Before you can remove a license group, you must remove any licenses associated with the group.

segment.source: To remove a license group
segment.target: To remove a license group

segment.source: In the left pane of the Application Virtualization Server Management Console, click and expand the Applications Licenses node.
segment.target: In the left pane of the Application Virtualization Server Management Console, click and expand the Applications Licenses node.

segment.source: Click the desired License Group.
segment.target: Click the desired License Group.

segment.source: In the right pane, right-click the license and select Delete.
segment.target: In the right pane, right-click the license and select Delete.

segment.source: Click Yes at the prompt.
segment.target: Click Yes at the prompt.

segment.source: In the left pane, right-click the desired license group and select Delete.
segment.target: In the left pane, right-click the desired license group and select Delete.
